text: Guglielmo Bruno (died 1531) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Andros (1492–1531). (in Latin)"Bishop Guglielmo Bruno" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 25, 2016"Diocese of Andros" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved February 29, 2016"Diocese of Andros" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved February 29, 2016 ==Biography== On 26 Aug 1492, Guglielmo Bruno was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VI as Bishop of Andros. He served as Bishop of Andros until his death in 1531. == See also == *Catholic Church in Greece == References == Category:15th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VI Category:1531 deaths
title: Guglielmo Bruno
